#labels Featured
<p>
Follow the Processing Wiki at http://wiki.processing.org/w/Android#Instructions to install the Android SDK for your operating system
</p>
<p>
<a href="http://code.google.com/p/ketai/downloads/list">Download</a> the Ketai library, current version 7 (requires Android Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0) or Jelly Bean (4.1))
<p>

= v7 Update log = 
<ul>
<li>Updated examples for all Ketai classes</li>
<li>Added SQLite Support</li>
<li>Added NFC Beam Support</li>
<li>Added Multi-Touch Gesture Support</li>
<li>Added WiFi Direct Support</li>
<li>Fixed Camera issues, increased performance</li>
</ul>

= Documentation = 
Library Examples and JavaDocs are included in the library zip folder.
The following book includes a comprehensive introduction to the Ketai library, and more than 20 projects using the library.
Available with source code at the <a href="http://pragprog.com/book/dsproc/rapid-android-development">The Pragmatic Bookshelf</a>

[http://imagery.pragprog.com/products/261/dsproc.jpg]
